description.value:
The name of your beloved adorns this stylized image of a heart. An unbreakable heart tattoo can be received only at the end of a successful @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heartbond] ritual, serving as your token. The other participant can have a token other than a tattoo if they wish. If you have more than one heartbond, each unbreakable heart you have serves as a token for only one of them. The love exuding from you grants you a +1 item bonus to Diplomacy checks. When you use heartbond's activity to learn your beloved's present state, you can also grant them a small gift, choosing from the following options each time. Make your choice after learning their state.

  • Your beloved gains 5 temporary Hit Points that last for 10 minutes.
  • The tattoo casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Guidance]on your beloved.
  • The tattoo casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stabilize]on your beloved.
  • The tattoo casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Light] on your beloved's token from heartbond
